components.name: hxCnHT
components.content: We need to ask some questions to check you can apply for this funding.

pages.title: Is your organisation based in England?

components.name: lqNzFM
components.title: Is your organisation based in England?

pages.title: What is the legal status of your organisation?

components.name: jhTJVo
components.title: What is the legal status of your organisation?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding.

components.name: htwsos
components.content:
Based on your answer, you are not eligible to apply for National Workforce Programme funding.
</br>
The organisation must be based in England.

pages.title: Does your unincorporated community group meet the following criteria?

components.name: wEcEMx
components.content:
Does your unincorporated community group fit all the following criteria:
  • was established for charitable, benevolent or philanthropic purposes
  • has a governing body with at least three members
  • has an inclusive Membership policy
  • has a governing document
  • can provide accounts for the last two financial years
  • has a UK based business bank account in the name of the organisation
  • can hold land either by itself or via Trustees

components.name: XANeey
components.title: Does your unincorporated community group meet the following criteria?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: YzwEba
components.content:
Based on your answer, you are not eligible to apply for National Workforce Programme funding.
</br>
The organisation must have one of the legal statuses listed.

pages.title: You can apply for National Workforce Programme funding
You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: ehODJF
components.content:
Based on your answer, you are not eligible to apply for National Workforce Programme funding.
</br>
Your unincorporated community group must meet the listed criteria.

items.text: A charity registered with the Charity Commission for England and Wales
items.value: A charity registered with the Charity Commission for England and Wales

items.text: A society registered under the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014
items.value: A society registered under the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014

items.text: a Community Interest Company registered with Companies House or with an asset lock
items.value: a Community Interest Company registered with Companies House or with an asset lock

items.text: a Charitable Incorporated Organisation registered with the Charity Commission for England and Wales
items.value: a Charitable Incorporated Organisation registered with the Charity Commission for England and Wales

items.text: A Company Limited by Guarantee registered with Companies House
items.value: A Company Limited by Guarantee registered with Companies House

items.text: A Cooperative and Community benefit society
items.value: A Cooperative and Community benefit society
